AddAcyclicConnectionStrategy
IAsexualReproductionStrategy​<T>
public sealed
AddAcyclicConnectionStrategy​<T>
where T : struct

A NEAT genome asexual reproduction strategy based on adding a single acyclic connection.

Offspring genomes are created by taking a clone of a single parent genome and adding a single acyclic connection, if possible.

Type Parameter
T

Connection weight data type.
